Pin subviews to edges on installation

iOS can remove and reinstall the view controller’s view in some cases, so it is important to preserve the Auto Layout constraints in these scenarios.

Merge pull request #63 from srstanic/master

Prevents a loss of a message.

Prevents a loss of a message.

Before this change, if a message is shown while the message of the same type
is being dismissed, the second message will simply be discarded.

After this change, the second message will be properly queued.

Merge pull request #57 from ceyhuno/master

Dispatched Presenter.init(config:view:delegate:) call in SwiftMessages class to the main queue

Dispatched `Presenter.init(config:view:delegate:)` call in `SwiftMessages` class to the main queue

`Presenter.init(config:view:delegate:)` initializes a `PassthroughView` instance variable called `maskingView` which is a `UIView` and this triggers a `setNeedsDisplay` call that should be made in the main thread.
Apply configureIcon to both image and text icon views
Add convenience function to specify icon size.
#45 don’t become key window by default
Remove files that should be ignored

Revert previous commit

Was mistaken about behavior. Original description was accurate.

Merge pull request #38 from JoshHrach/patch-1

Corrected link to 3.1.1 tag

Make eventListeners property non-optional

No need for both `nil` and `[]` states on `eventListeners` and making non-optional simplifies the syntax a little bit.

Merge pull request #28 from OakCityLabs/master

Add shouldAutorotate to the Config class.
Minor internal and demo app cleanup

Add shouldAutorotate to the Config class.

When a viewcontroller is created to host the message view, this property controls whether that viewcontroller with auto rotate when the device orientation changes.
Also update the demo’s “Explor” screen to include this option.

Merge pull request #25 from raven/master

Add `ProvisioningStyle: Automatic;` to framework target

Update appetize.io link

Point to cocoacontrols.com's appetize.io embed. The direct appetize.io link was getting expensive.
Add randomized emoji icon in demo

Add function to return random array element

Returns a random element from the array. Can be used to create a playful message that cycles randomly through a set of emoji icons, for example.

Fix #6 add public initializer

There is no way to create SwiftMessages instance as there is no public initializer.

Merge pull request #2 from defagos/carthage-fixes

Carthage fixes
Add missing resources to framework target
Fix bundle retrieval in iOS 8 framework generated by Carthage
Set project deployment target to iOS 8

Add icon style support

Add support for specifying an `IconStyle` in the `MessageView.configureTheme()` convenience function.

Add code comments

Added comments to most public APIs except the MessageView class.

Move viewFromNib into SwiftMessages

This avoids the awkward naving conventions needed for extensions UIView and there is no real advantage to the methods being defined on UIView.
Explicitly set nib file module names
Don’t automatically clear message view’s background color
Demote viewFromNib to MessageView class function

Add podspec

Reorganized demo files into a separate folder to simplify podspec file selection.
Show behind navigation and tab bars
Allow touches to pass through OverWindowViewController
